title: GAME OF THRONES Season 8 Episode 5 Breakdown, Recap and Theories! | Was It Bad? | The Bells
author: Think Story
comment: A little different from my usual breakdowns. Bonus points if you found the hidden Starbucks cup I put somewhere in the video!
Night king was actually a good guy because he wanted to kill everyone before this shit happened
The biggest loser in game of thrones is definitely the iron bank of braavos

Past seasons complaints: 90% nitpicks but enough to be enjoyable.
This season: Structural problems in the writing that's so bad I can't enjoy the best action in television history.
"Best season ever!" - Emilia Clark, cringing inwardly
description:
In this breakdown we take a look at Game of Thrones Season 8 Episode 5 "The Bells" recapping and reviewing why I think this is the death of the show. Is the writing as bad as others make it out to be?
